title: Time to main ADC
body:
Time to main ADC because for literally 7 games in a row my bot lane were feeders.

Time to main ADC.

replies.body: time to **f**uck off as well too, cause all you do is %%%%%. try investing into a diary.

>
> time to **f**uck off as well too, cause all you do is %%%%%. try investing into a diary.
Least I'm not the one scared to do provisionals because I'm scared to change my name to SilverTomat0.
Least I'm not the one scared to do provisionals because I'm scared to change my name to SilverTomat0.

enjoy getting 2 shotted by assassins.

There will be no peel

> [{quoted}](name=Bookbash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=u2uasfhg,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-02-06T14:00:18.392+0000)
>
> Can't carry as support :)

Over 80% Soraka win rate in normals here last time I checked.
Nope, can't carry as support.
No one nearby which you can make snowball, and no teamfights you can win through utility and shotcalling and you also have no dragon control and like you get no money as support with all those assists you rake in if you are doing things right.

Last game I played Thresh support. I made more gold than my top laner and he wasn't AFK. Time to main top jk not changing my main role because of how cancerous other people are. I play support because they hold the most playmaking power in the early game and mid game and they're the reason why adcs are the highest damage late game. Also, playing support trains your positioning, item builds and identifying mistakes more than any other role.

Top lane is about zoning and top jungle control. Mid lane is about out-farming, tracking the enemy jungler and identifying power spikes. Jungle is about zone control, pressure, and pushing. ADC is about playing like a complete pansy and facerolling late game. Roam (yes it's somewhat a position, even though not in the META) is about making your enemy jungler's life hell (teemo shrooms, donger harrass, shaco boxes, zyra plants, sapling stacking etc) and securing objectives.
that's why I play sup if no one else can play well
Nice double post. I'm not doing placements cause I have 200 ping and I'm using a laptop that can barely hold 30 fps.
Main support and pick Soraka. Keep the ADC from being able to feed :P
